Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ann::components::base::base ( name  )
inline

Superclass for ann.components objects. It is also a dummy by-pass object (does nothing with input/output data).

Parameters
nameA lua string with the name of the component.
ann::components::base::~base ( lua_State *  L)
inline
